text: "Annihilate" is a song off the soundtrack for the 2023 movie Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse. The song is by American record producer Metro Boomin and American rappers Swae Lee, Lil Wayne and Offset. The song was released on June 2, 2023. The song was able to make it to #14 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs, #23 on the Canadian Hot 100, #30 on the Billboard Global 200, and #44 on the Billboard Hot 100 music charts. The song is about being strong and having confidence, swinging through the city like Spider-Man and feeling like one is in their own World. Everybody in the song makes references tothe superhero Spider-Man. A music video for the song was released. The music video is animated and shows Spider-Man and Spider-Gwen swinging around the city. They also go through different dimensions in the Spider-Verse and fight enemies. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2023 songs Category:Lil Wayne songs Category:Swae Lee songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Annihilate (song)
